text: Regan is a city in Burleigh County, North Dakota, United States. Its population was 35 in 2020. Regan was founded in 1912. ==Geography== Regan is in the coordinates (47.157318, âˆ’100.529396). The city is of land. ==Climate== Regan's climate has lots of temperature changes throughout the seasons. It's usually very hot and humid in the summers and cold in the winters. Regan has a humid continental climate.Climate Summary for Regan, North Dakota ==References== ==Other websites== * History of Regan and the Regan Community, 1912-1962 from the Digital Horizons website Category:Cities in North Dakota
title: Regan, North Dakota
